TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Trace extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组方法和属性，帮助您跟踪代码的执行。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that help you trace the execution of your code.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用的属性和方法中的来检测发行的类生成。You can use the properties and methods in the class to instrument release builds. 检测可用于监视在真实生活设置中运行的应用程序的运行状况。Instrumentation allows you to monitor the health of your application running in real-life settings. 跟踪帮助隔离问题，而不影响正在运行的系统修复它们。Tracing helps you isolate problems and fix them without disturbing a running system. 此类提供了方法显示对话框中，并发出始终将断言。This class provides methods to display an dialog box, and to emit an assertion that will always . 此类提供的以下变体的写入方法： ， ， ，和。This class provides write methods in the following variations: , , , and . 和类提供动态控制跟踪输出方法。The and classes provide means to dynamically control the tracing output. 无需重新编译你的应用程序，可以修改这些开关的值。You can modify the values of these switches without recompiling your application. 有关使用配置文件设置开关的信息，请参阅类和[如何： 创建、 初始化和配置跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)主题。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see the class and the [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md) topic. 可以通过添加自定义跟踪输出的目标实例到或删除实例从集合。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding instances to or removing instances from the collection. 集合共享两个和类; 添加到其中一个类的跟踪侦听器将侦听器添加到两。The collection is shared by both the and the classes; adding a trace listener to either class adds the listener to both. 默认情况下，使用发出跟踪输出类。By default, trace output is emitted using the class. > [!NOTE] > 添加到跟踪侦听器集合可能导致异常引发时进行跟踪，如果跟踪侦听器使用的资源不可用。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 条件和引发的异常取决于跟踪侦听器，并不能在本主题中枚举。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 它可能会有用呼叫中的方法`try` / `catch`块来检测和处理从跟踪侦听器的任何异常。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. > [!NOTE] > 如果将跟踪侦听器添加到部分受信任的代码，则您将收到 异常，因为添加跟踪侦听器需要 权限。If you add trace listeners to partially trusted code, you will get a exception, because adding trace listeners requires permission. 若要跟踪正在 Visual Studio 的沙盒中运行的部分受信任的代码，请不要添加跟踪侦听器。To trace partially trusted code that is running in a sandbox in Visual Studio, do not add trace listeners. 相反，查看和中的消息**输出**窗口。Instead, view the and messages in the **Output** window. 类提供的属性来获取或设置的级别、 ，以及是否每次写入后。The class provides properties to get or set the level of , the , and whether to after each write. 若要设置和为，你可以编辑与你的应用程序名称相对应的配置文件。To set the and for , you can edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 特性应用于的方法。The attribute is applied to the methods of . 支持的编译器忽略对这些方法的调用，除非"TRACE"定义为有条件编译符号。Compilers that support ignore calls to these methods unless "TRACE" is defined as a conditional compilation symbol. 请参阅编译器的文档，以确定是否支持以及用于定义条件编译符号的语法。Refer to a compiler's documentation to determine whether is supported and the syntax for defining a conditional compilation symbol. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio 项目中，默认情况下，为调试版本定义“DEBUG”条件编译符号，并为调试版本和发行版本定义“TRACE”符号。In Visual Studio projects, by default, the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol is defined for debug builds, and the "TRACE" symbol is defined for both debug and release builds. 有关如何禁用此行为的信息，请参阅 Visual Studio 文档。For information about how to disable this behavior, see the Visual Studio documentation. 若要在 C# 中定义“TRACE”条件编译符号，请在使用命令行编译代码时将 `/d:TRACE` 选项添加到编译器命令行，或将 `#define TRACE` 添加到文件顶部。To define the "TRACE" conditional compilation symbol in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` option to the compiler command line when you compile your code using a command line, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:TRACE=True`到编译器命令行选项或添加`#Const TRACE=True`文件。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` option to the compiler command line or add `#Const TRACE=True` to the file. 不支持 c + + 编译器。 is not supported by the C++ compiler. 若要提供等效的功能，必须将对的方法的调用中`#if defined(TRACE) ... #endif`块，并添加`/DTRACE`到编译器命令行选项或添加`#define TRACE`文件。To provide equivalent functionality, you must enclose calls to the methods of in an `#if defined(TRACE) ... #endif` block, and add the `/DTRACE` option to the compiler command line or add `#define TRACE` to the file. ## Examples 下面的示例使用以指示开头和结尾的程序的执行。The following example uses to indicate the beginning and the end of a program's execution. 此示例还使用和方法来区分将跟踪输出。The example also uses the and methods to distinguish the tracing output. 有关使用的更完整示例，请参阅[如何： 向应用程序代码添加跟踪语句](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-add-trace-statements-to-application-code.md)。For a more complete example of the use of , see [How to: Add Trace Statements to Application Code](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-add-trace-statements-to-application-code.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法如果你想要执行断言版本中的可生成。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 方法仅在调试版本中有效。The method works only in debug builds. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管代码中的断言](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). 通常情况下，方法用于标识程序开发过程的逻辑错误。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 计算条件。 evaluates the condition. 如果结果为`false`，它将发送到失败消息集合。If the result is `false`, it sends a failure message to the collection. 可以通过添加自定义此行为，或从中移除集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 当在用户界面模式下运行应用程序时，它将显示一个消息框，显示文件和行号的调用堆栈。When the application runs in user-interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 消息框包含三个按钮：**中止**，**重试**，和**忽略**。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 单击**中止**按钮终止应用程序。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 单击**重试**向你发送到调试器中的代码中，如果你的应用程序运行在调试器中，或如果它不是打开调试器。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 单击**忽略**继续在代码中的下一步指令。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > 在消息框显示取决于是否存在的。The display of the message box depends on the presence of the . 如果不在集合，消息框不会显示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以删除[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)、 [<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或通过调用方法属性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 你可以更改的行为对应于你的应用程序的名称的配置文件中。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，你可以启用和禁用断言消息框或设置属性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 配置文件应格式如下：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例创建数组的索引。The following example creates an index for an array. 然后被执行一些操作设置的值的索引。Then some action is performed that sets the value of the index. 接下来，该代码调用验证索引值是否有效。Next the code calls to verify the index value is valid. 如果不是有效，输出调用堆栈。If it is not valid, the outputs the call stack. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 刷新流将不会刷新其基础的编码器，除非你明确地调用或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但不是会刷新编码器状态。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8 和 UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. 若要设置和为，还可以编辑与你的应用程序名称相对应的配置文件。To set the and for , you can also edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时输出将为文件，如。Use this method when the output is going to a file, such as to the . 刷新流将不会刷新其基础的编码器，除非你明确地调用或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但不是会刷新编码器状态。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8 和 UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为`myTextListener`。The following example creates a named `myTextListener`. `myTextListener` 使用调用`myOutputWriter`要写入到名为的文件`TestFile.txt`。`myTextListener` uses a called `myOutputWriter` to write to a file named `TestFile.txt`. 该示例创建的文件、 流和文本编写器，一行文本写入文件，然后刷新并关闭输出。The example creates the file, stream and text writer, writes one line of text to the file, and then flushes and closes the output. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认跟踪侦听器的默认行为是输出`message`参数到消息框时应用程序运行在用户界面模式下，并对其实例集合。The default behavior for the default trace listener is to output the `message` parameter to a message box when the application runs in user-interface mode, and to the instances in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 显示消息框是依赖于是否存在。The display of the message box is dependent on the presence of the . 如果不在集合，消息框不会显示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以删除[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)、 [<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或通过调用方法属性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 可以通过添加自定义此行为添加或从中移除集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or by removing one from, the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以在异常处理期间打印消息。The following example uses the method to print a message during exception handling. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果跟踪侦听器不是线程安全的无论的值如何，始终使用全局锁。The global lock is always used if the trace listener is not thread safe, regardless of the value of . 属性用于确定侦听器是否是线程安全。The property is used to determine if the listener is thread safe. 仅当不使用全局锁的值是`false`和的值是`true`。The global lock is not used only if the value of is `false` and the value of is `true`. 默认行为是使用全局锁。The default behavior is to use the global lock. 若要设置为，还可以编辑与你的应用程序名称相对应的配置文件。To set the for , you can also edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，则输出写入到的实例。By default, the output is written to an instance of . 此方法调用的跟踪侦听器的方法。This method calls the method of the trace listener. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 提供对 Web 页定制的跟踪功能。ASP.NET supplies tracing functionality tailored for Web pages. 若要在 ASP.NET 页中编写跟踪消息，使用属性。To write trace messages in ASP.NET pages, use the property. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页，该语句相关联的代码在`Trace.Write("...")`是对的调用方法属性。By default, in code associated with an ASP.NET Web page, the statement `Trace.Write("...")` is a call to the method of the property. 若要使用类在 Web 页中，你必须包括命名空间，例如， `System.Diagnostics.Trace.Write("...")`。To use the class in Web pages, you must include the namespace, for example, `System.Diagnostics.Trace.Write("...")`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为`generalSwitch`。The following example creates a named `generalSwitch`. 此开关已设置之外的代码示例。This switch is set outside the code sample. 如果开关设置为`Error`或更高版本，该示例将输出的名字`value`参数。If the switch is set to the `Error` or higher, the example outputs the first name of the `value` parameter to the . 有关将添加到侦听器信息集合，请参阅类。For information on adding a listener to the collection, see the class. 然后，如果设置为`Verbose`，该示例将输出与第一条消息位于同一行中的消息。Then, if the is set to `Verbose`, the example outputs a message on the same line as the first message. 第二条消息后跟行结束符。The second message is followed by a line terminator. 可以通过使用检测应用程序性能的影响最小化语句而不是使用语句。
You can minimize the performance penalty of instrumenting your application by using statements instead of using statements.
下面的两个代码示例将相同的调试消息发送。
The following two code examples send the same debugging message.
但是，第一个示例是要快得多当跟踪处于关闭状态，因为如果mySwitch.TraceError计算结果为不调用。
However, the first example is much faster when tracing is off, because if mySwitch.TraceError evaluates to you do not call .
第二个示例始终调用，即使当mySwitch.TraceError是和不生成任何跟踪输出。
The second example always calls , even when mySwitch.TraceError is and no tracing output is produced.
这可能导致不必要地执行任意复杂的代码。
This can result in unnecessary execution of arbitrarily complex code.
**第一个示例**
**First example**
``` if(mySwitch.TraceError) Trace.Write("aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```
**第二个示例****Second example**
``` Trace.WriteIf(mySwitch.TraceError, "aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，则输出写入到的实例。By default, the output is written to an instance of . `category`参数可以用于输出消息分组。The `category` parameter can be used to group output messages. 此方法调用的跟踪侦听器的方法。This method calls the method of the trace listener. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为`generalSwitch`。The following example creates a named `generalSwitch`. 此开关已设置之外的代码示例。This switch is set outside the code sample. 如果开关设置为 `Verbose`，该示例将输出发送给第一个错误消息。If the switch is set to the `Verbose`, the example outputs the first error message to the . 有关将添加到侦听器信息集合，请参阅类。For information on adding a listener to the collection, see the class. 然后，如果设置为`Error`或更高版本，该示例将输出与第一条消息位于同一行上的第二个错误消息。Then, if the is set to `Error` or higher, the example outputs the second error message on the same line as the first message. 第二条消息后跟行结束符。The second message is followed by a line terminator. 可以通过使用检测应用程序性能的影响最小化语句而不是使用语句。
You can minimize the performance penalty of instrumenting your application by using statements instead of using statements.
下面的两个代码示例将相同的调试消息发送。
The following two code examples send the same debugging message.
但是，第一个示例是要快得多当跟踪处于关闭状态，因为如果mySwitch.TraceError计算结果为不调用。
However, the first example is much faster when tracing is off, because if mySwitch.TraceError evaluates to you do not call .
第二个示例始终调用，即使当mySwitch.TraceError是和不生成任何跟踪输出。
The second example always calls , even when mySwitch.TraceError is and no tracing output is produced.
这可能导致不必要地执行任意复杂的代码。
This can result in unnecessary execution of arbitrarily complex code.
**第一个示例**
**First example**
``` if(mySwitch.TraceError) Trace.Write("aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```
**第二个示例****Second example**
``` Trace.WriteIf(mySwitch.TraceError, "aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```

You can minimize the performance penalty of instrumenting your application by using statements instead of using statements.
下面的两个代码示例将相同的调试消息发送。
The following two code examples send the same debugging message.
但是，第一个示例是要快得多当跟踪处于关闭状态，因为如果mySwitch.TraceError计算结果为不调用。
However, the first example is much faster when tracing is off, because if mySwitch.TraceError evaluates to you do not call .
第二个示例始终调用，即使当mySwitch.TraceError是和不生成任何跟踪输出。
The second example always calls , even when mySwitch.TraceError is and no tracing output is produced.
这可能导致不必要地执行任意复杂的代码。
This can result in unnecessary execution of arbitrarily complex code.
**第一个示例**
**First example**
``` if(mySwitch.TraceError) Trace.WriteLine("aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```
**第二个示例****Second example**
``` Trace.WriteLineIf(mySwitch.TraceError, "aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```
